title: Gay Pride
description: A naked submissive and a rainbow coloured flag, what gay dominant could resist?Crenshaw hasn't had much time to hit the leather clubs since he got really involved in the gay pride movement, but when he finds a drunken submissive standing on his doorstep wearing nothing more than a rainbow coloured flag, it's obviously time for him to get back into the game.Jayden might not be really into the whole gay pride thing, but he's very proud of his plan to get Crenshaw's attention. All he has to do now, is convince the older man to keep him around once he's sobered up.Reader Advisory: The stories in this series are connected solely by theme. They can all be read as stand alone titles and read in any order.
author: Kim Dare
